metadata.synopsis: Clickable Karlach father's tombstone. It has his name engraved on it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Have Karlach in your party. 3. goto 5; 39; 304. Click on any of the tombs with the VFX appearing and go through Karlach's OM.5. Click again on the tomb at 5; 39; 30.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *'Here lies Pluck Cliffgate - beloved husband and father.'*
